name: DIWOC
description:
Control using arrow keys, I dunno, maybe WSAD works too?

I don't feel strongly about this game but it's fun, silly exploration of a pretty basic mechanic. There might be some neat surprises in there, so maybe it's worth the, like, 5-10 minutes it takes to get to the end :)

I don't remember what the name means, if anything. That mystery is lost to time.
